Kashmir Conflicts.name: Kashmir Conflicts
Kashmir Conflicts.description: This library has conflicts related to Kashmir. The eastern region of the former state of Kashmir has been involved in a boundary dispute.The region is divided among three countries in a territorial dispute: Pakistan controls the northwest portion (Northern Areas and Azad Kashmir), India controls the central and southern portion (Jammu and Kashmir) and Ladakh, and China controls the northeastern portion (Aksai Chin and the Trans-Karakoram Tract).

United States after World War II.name: United States in after World War II
United States after World War II.description: The period for the US saw an active foreign policy designed to rescue Europe and Asia from the devastation of World War II and to influence the expansion of Communism, represented by the Soviet Union and China.
